member.name: F:Wasenshi.HemoDialysisPro.Report.Api.APIValidationMiddleware.cache
member.summary: For improving performance and reduce DB round trip

member.name: T:Wasenshi.HemoDialysisPro.Report.Api.LogConfig.LoggingMiddleware
member.summary: This middleware helps logging to be able to capture Response Body. It buffers the body, let other middlewares use and read the body and then re-assign the original body for output.
